snippet: Again and again, Steve Jobs would step up to entrenched players in media and explain their business to them in ways they didn’t recognize from the inside.

headline.main: Steve Jobs Reigned in a Kingdom of Altered Landscapes

snippet: Steve Jobs is a genius. He is an innovator. A visionary. He is perhaps the most beloved billionaire in the world.     Surprisingly, there is one thing that Mr. Jobs is not, at least not yet: a prominent philanthropist.
abstract: Andrew Ross Sorkin Dealbook column; Steve Jobs, who stepped down as chief executive of Apple, has focused on his work and family, but not, at least publicly, any philanthropic endeavors; photo (M)

snippet: Here’s a new fall classic for a young student’s lunch box: a fresh sandwich of turkey and apple, bound together with mayonnaise spiked with maple syrup. For a kick, swirl a little Sriracha sauce into the mayonnaise.

headline.main: A Good Appetite: Here’s Eating Lunch With You, Kid
headline.name: Turkey Sandwiches With Maple Mayonnaise
